channel.title: Blist Multilingual Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: About Me
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content. Other notable features are taxonomies, multilingual mode, image processing, custom output formats, HTML/CSS/JS minification and support for Sass SCSS workflows. Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.

item.title: Student Activism
item.description: Miguel is the co-founder of Dores Divest, and student activist campaign that made international headlines in February 2022 for filing legal complaints regarding Vanderbilt’s fossil fuel investments. Learn more here.

item.title: Graduate Mentor
item.description: “I’m proud to be part of a program that helps students realize that STEM can be inclusive to everyone, regardless of your background,” Moravec said. Read the full article here

item.title: Climate Scholar
item.description: Worked with NOAA scientist to analyze climate data, automatically generate relevant figures/plots, and ultimately contribute science to the North-American Multi-Model Ensemble, as hosted by Princeton University’s Department of Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences. Check out this newsletter from Princeton University featuring my work here.
